Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.setting.columnselection

Class ColumnSelection

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.setting.columnselection.ColumnSelection
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistableSettings
public final class ColumnSelection extends Object implements PersistableSettings
A class used to store a selected column together with additional information (e.g. type).
